entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure: JIT PGO ProfileCastClassAndIsInst connection timed out #75867
  • ReadOnlySequence<T> GetOffset does not function correctly with non-zero starting indices #75866
  • Make GC stack walking robust in the presence of unmanaged byrefs with extended lifetime #75865
  • warning CS1685: The predefined type 'System.ObsoleteAttribute' is defined in multiple assemblies in the global alias #75859
  • Inefficient Boolean comparisons on Arm64 #75852
    8.0.0
  • Inefficient Vector128.Equals* comparisons on Arm64 #75849
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-diffs results improvements #75848
    8.0.0
  • Diagnostic support for frozen string literals #75836
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Late expansion of delegate calls can reorder null checks with other argument exceptions #75832
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests - Helix timeout #75830
  • [libraries-pgo] Issues related to overlapped IO #75828
    8.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set ... but is required because of the following tree #75827
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add "FileSystemPath" string syntax type constants to StringSyntaxAttribute #75826
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetDtcTransaction #75822
  • Test failure profiler\\gc\\gcbasic\\gcbasic.cmd #75821
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #75820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.sh #75819
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Framework source stepping not working for R2R assemblies in 6.0 Preview 3 #53009
    Future
  • JIT doesn't eliminate redundant branch in guarded span.Slice #65327
    Future
  • System.Net.Security crash on arm64-Mono #75484
    7.0.0
  • SPMI CI runs need to surface context misses #70350
    8.0.0
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failed #64675
    8.0.0
  • [Android] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField test failure #60558
    8.0.0
  • Android app size regression in .NET 7 RC 1 #75267
    7.0.0
  • Mono JIT/HardwareIntrinsics - Massive failures #75606
    8.0.0
  • Web Assembly Blazor debug issue - Childeren could not be evulated #75763
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Faster Vector128/64 compare on arm64 #75864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use clock_gettime_nsec_np if available in GCToOSInterface::GetLowPrecisionTimeStamp #75862
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Add definition of hostfxr_get_dotnet_environment_info_fn to hostfxr.h #75860
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fixing SpanHelpers.LastIndexOfAnyValueType to no longer create out of bounds GC refs #75857
    area-System.Memory
  • Add missing inheritdocs references to IParsable.TryParse #75856
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix querying L3 cache size on osx-x64 #75854
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75853
    area-System.Console
  • Updating the initial capacity of the intrinsic TypeConverter dictionary #75850
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fail-fast on SuspendThread/ResumeThread failures #75845
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits #75844
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix a rare crash when creating or opening named mutexes #75843
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • JIT: move optOptimizeBools later in the phase list #75842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand delegate calls in morph #75841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that the VNFunc for HWIntrinsics are properly marked as commutative where possible #75840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Resolve constrained static virtual calls in gshared methods. #75839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • replace ToUtf8 with Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes #75834
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Faster "obj is T[]" for sealed T #75816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use CommonPrefixLength for SetOf sort validation #75851
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75799
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75825
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75833
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Bump 7.0 intellisense package version (WinForms docs update) #75786
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • JIT: extend RBO partial inference to unsigned relops #75804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix FailFast logging message #75718
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Small diagnostics improvements to HostWriter #75593
    area-HostModel, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Fix System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failing test on ARMv6 and Android #75458
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Ensure GenTree::isCommutativeHWIntrinsic works on Arm64 #75818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix grammatical error in #75831. #75835
    area-System.Collections
  • Update List.cs #75831
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Delete unused code #75814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete some unused includes and files #75805
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75800
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono]Disable failing intrinsics tests for llvmaot CI lane, due to disabling LLVM JIT #75768
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • No need to try hijack/suspend GC threads #75810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #75172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Initialize Volatile value #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75703
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Transactions
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update System.Formats.Tar docs #75386
    documentation, area-System.IO
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
